title: Nocturne in Eb Major, Op. 9 No. 2

musicalLanguage.description: Chopin's most beloved Nocturne, Op. 9 No. 2, features one of the most singing melodies ever written for piano. This simplified 8-bar excerpt captures the essential theme: a soaring right-hand melody over gently rocking left-hand arpeggios in 12/8 time.
teachingGoals: Develop singing legato tone in the right hand
styleTips: The melody should sing as if a vocalist were performing it
Left hand arpeggios should be very soft and even — a cushion for the melody
